title: OUC update: Nationals!
body:
Hi everyone!

http://i.imgur.com/KcLJuDX.jpg

I wanted to give you an update about how the University Championship is going. We've had Universities from across Oceania battling it out and five have risen to the challenge and move onto the Nationals this weekend.

Queensland University of Technology [QUT]
RMIT University [RMIT]
University of Western Australia [UWA]
University of Auckland [UOA]
Western Sydney University [WS]

These five universities will now fight to try and reach the grand finals. Grand Finalists will be flown out to Sydney to face off on the 9th of September live from the Riot Games studio!

This weekend's games will be starting at 1pm AEST on both Saturday (12th) and Sunday (13th) of August.

The teams will then be seeded into a gauntlet format to be played out on the 19th and 20th of August. Games will be happening on the 19th of August starting at 12pm AEST and games on the 20th of August starting at 1pm AEST.

Both weekends will be streamed on 
https://www.twitch.tv/uniloloce

Make sure you tune in to support your University! Who do you think will come out on top?

replies.body:
> This weekend's games will be starting at 1pm AEST on both Saturday (13th) and Sunday (14th) of August.

Saturday is the 12th... And Sunday is the 13th...
Wasn't  the first time riot games made a mistake lul
